headline: Did Expanded Data Center Insurance Capacity Just Shift Marsh & McLennan Companies' (MRSH) Investment Narrative?
summary: In recent days, Marsh Risk, a business of Marsh, expanded its Nimbus facility to offer up to US$2.70 billion in coverage for large-scale data center construction projects across North America, Europe, Australia, and New Zealand, including protection for delay in start-up and business interruption. This move deepens Marsh’s role in insuring critical digital infrastructure linked to AI and cloud computing, reinforcing its position in complex, high-capital project risk management. We’ll now...

headline: Marsh McLennan’s Secure Harbor Targets Senior Living Risk And Returns
summary: Marsh McLennan Agency, part of Marsh & McLennan Companies (NYSE:MRSH), has launched Secure Harbor, a captive insurance company focused on the senior living sector. The new group captive is designed for skilled nursing, assisted living, and broader senior living communities facing challenging insurance conditions. Secure Harbor aims to give participating clients more control over coverage structure, pricing stability, and access to potential profit sharing. For you as an investor, Secure...

headline: Marsh & McLennan (MRSH) Q4 Earnings Report Preview: What To Look For
summary: Professional services firm Marsh & McLennan (NYSE:MMC) will be reporting earnings this Thursday before the bell. Here’s what investors should know.
